thread.title: Ask E. Jean: My Boyfriend Added Me to His Facebook Gallery of Exes

author: E. Jean
title: Ask E. Jean: My Boyfriend Added Me to His Facebook Gallery of Exes
text:
Ask E. Jean: My Boyfriend Added Me to His Facebook Gallery of Exes 
Is it unreasonable to ask him to take my photo out? Everett By E. Jean Feb 22, 2017 Dear E. Jean: My ex-boyfriend has my pictures posted on his Facebook in a special photo collection—along with all of his other ex- girlfriends. Would it be so terrible of me to ask him to take my pictures down? I dislike being grouped with Connie, MaryBeth, Jo Anne, Billie, Cindie, Jannine, Debra, Pamela, Karen, Regina, Kim, Stacy, Tamara, and Jennifer. — Not Another Notch My Ninotchka: If Facebook had been around in the 1640s, then Ottoman Sultan Ibrahim I might have simply removed his harem's photos from his page. Instead, he tied up the poor ladies in sacks, weighted them with rocks, and threw all 280 of them into the Bosporus. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below If your Mr. Blow-Up refuses to remove your picture, create a group on Facebook. Invite Connie, MaryBeth, Jo Anne, Billie, Cindie, Jannine, Debra, Pamela, Karen, Regina, Kim, Stacy, Tamara, and Jennifer to join. Then let the chump know that since he's so fond of photos, you'll be exchanging his snaps de pene until he sets you all free. This letter is from the E. Jean archive. More from ELLE:
